item.title: Home Assistant Install Guide
item.description: In this tutorial, we’re going to set up Node-Red and use our SSL proxy to protect its webUI. Pre-requisites In the post, I’m going to assume you already have: A server running docker nginx-proxy-manager installed on that server, and have already configured it with an SSL wildcard certificate. If you haven’t, go read my Set up nginx-proxy-manager post and set it up. Installation We’re going to use docker-compose to run homeassistant.

item.title: Node Red Setup Guide
